DOC.brief_summary: A randomised , placebo-controlled , parallel human dietary intervention trial conduct 33 healthy male investigate vascular cognitive effect bi-daily consumption high-flavanol ( epicatechin-rich ) milk chocolate 2-week intervention period . Subjects visit Hugh Sinclair Unit Human Nutrition 3 separate occasion ; begin , end post-intervention .
DOC.brief_title: The Vascular Cognitive Effects Chronic High-flavanol Intake Healthy Males
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Body Mass Index 18.527.5 kg/m2 Normal Blood pressure ( < 150/90 ) Nonsmoker Regular exercise routine Signed consent form Haemoglobin ( anaemia marker ) < 125 g/l Gamma GT ( liver enzymes ) > 80 IU/l Total Cholesterol > 6.5 mmol/l Suffered myocardial infarction stroke last 12 month Suffers cardiovascular metabolic disorder Suffers bloodclotting disorder , and/or take support medication Any dietary restriction weight reduce diet On lipidmodifying blood pressure lower medication Consuming specific vitamin/ herbal supplement fish oil
